activities.name: Robotics Club
activities.description: Designed autonomous navigation systems for competitive robots
activities.impact: Led team to regional championship, mentored 8 younger students

activities.name: Volunteer Tutoring
activities.description: Tutored underprivileged students in algebra and geometry
activities.impact: Improved student grades by average of 1.2 letter grades

activities.name: Cultural Heritage Club
activities.description: Organized cultural awareness events and language preservation workshops
activities.impact: Increased school cultural diversity awareness by 40%, preserved family traditions

activities.name: Environmental Club
activities.description: Led campus sustainability initiatives and community clean-up events
activities.impact: Reduced school waste by 25%, organized 15 community events

activities.name: Peer Mentorship Program
activities.description: Guided freshman students through academic and social challenges

core_values.description: Belief in using technology to solve real-world problems
evidence: Created app for local food bank

core_values.description: Deep appreciation for heritage and traditions
Responsibility to protect and preserve our planet

defining_moments.title: First Programming Success
defining_moments.description: Creating my first working program that solved a real problem for our school's attendance system
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Overwhelming sense of accomplishment and realization that code could create meaningful change
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Technology can be a powerful tool for positive impact when applied thoughtfully

defining_moments.title: Supporting Struggling Family Member
defining_moments.description: Helping my younger sibling through a difficult learning disability diagnosis and finding new ways to support their education
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Deep sense of responsibility and protective love that reshaped my priorities
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Everyone learns differently; patience, creativity, and unconditional support can unlock potential

defining_moments.title: Cultural Identity Crisis
defining_moments.description: Struggling with feeling disconnected from my heritage and then rediscovering it through community involvement
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Initial shame and confusion transformed into deep pride and sense of belonging
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Understanding your roots strengthens your sense of self and connection to others

defining_moments.title: Failed Leadership Attempt
defining_moments.description: Trying to lead a school environmental project that completely fell apart due to my poor planning and communication
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Humiliation and disappointment that forced me to confront my limitations
defining_moments.lessons_learned: True leadership requires listening, planning, and building consensus, not just having good ideas

defining_moments.title: Tutoring Breakthrough Moment
defining_moments.description: Helping a student who had been failing math finally understand a concept after weeks of different approaches
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Joy and validation that teaching and patience can truly transform someone's life
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Everyone has potential; the key is finding the right approach and never giving up
